description:
Your Injury Attorney In Providence

Serving all of Providence County and the surrounding areas from our law office in Providence, Rhode Island, d'Oliveira & Associates P.C. is committed to providing the highest level of advocacy possible to those suffering from an act of negligence or wrongdoing.

Social Security Disability And Workers' Compensation

In addition to handling all types of personal injury and wrongful death claims, we also provide high-quality assistance and support in the areas of Social Security Disability and workers' compensation to those who were hurt on the job and can no longer work.

Decades Of Experience, Excellent Results

Founded in 1989 by top-rated personal injury attorney Paul d’Oliveira, our law firm has grown to include 15 office locations throughout Rhode Island and Massachusetts. With nearly 100 years of combined legal experience among them, our attorneys possess the skills and resources necessary to help you obtain the maximum amount of compensation and benefits possible for the damages you incurred as well as for your pain and suffering.

Throughout our history, we have secured over $200 million in settlements and awards on behalf of our clients, and every attorney at our law firm comes highly rated for the impeccable, client-focused service we provide to those in need.

Find Peace Of Mind For Your Suffering

If you were hurt in a car accident or through some other act of negligence, or if you can no longer work due to a job-related illness or injury, you owe it to yourself and your future to contact d'Oliveira & Associates P.C. to schedule an appointment for a free initial consultation. With our help, you may secure the finances you need to focus on your recovery.

Servicing all of the following Providence Neighborhoods

  • Blackstone
  • Federal Hill
  • Charles
  • College Hill
  • Downtown
  • Elmhurst
  • Elmwood
  • Fox Point
  • Hartford
